articles.title: A bad season for Boston College football gets even worse, and other takeaways at the midpoint
articles.description:
Boston College has unraveled to become one of the worst Power Four teams in the nation. When the season began players, coaches, and the fan base convinced themselves this would be the year the Eagles finally broke through. Now, after an appalling start, with the only win coming over Fordham in Week 1, things have […]
